Module count
Package count.model

Class SimulatedEvolution

java.lang.Object
count.model.SimulatedEvolution
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParametricBootstrap
public class SimulatedEvolution
extends Object
Precise, simulation of copy number evolution based on copy-level discrete events.
Author:
Miklós Csűrös
